tier_verification: Most claims are business outcome metrics rather than functional optimization descriptions. Only C8 (onboarding process improvement) and C11 (team scaling efficiency) clearly represent tier 1 capability cases. Several claims (C2, C6, C7, C9, C14) could be tier 1 with more detail on underlying process improvements. This case appears to mix business outcomes with some genuine capability improvements.
